name: Iran Internet Monitor
description: Real-time monitoring of Iran's internet connectivity, censorship, and circumvention tools

services.name: IODA BGP Visibility
services.description: BGP route visibility for Iran ‚Äî measures how many Iran prefixes are globally reachable

services.name: IODA Active Probing
services.description: Active ping reachability ‚Äî how many /24 blocks in Iran respond to pings

services.name: IODA MERIT Telescope
services.description: MERIT network telescope ‚Äî background radiation from Iran IP space

services.name: IODA Google Traffic
services.description: Google Transparency Report traffic data for Iran

services.name: IODA Outage Alerts
services.description: Active outage alerts detected by IODA for Iran

services.name: IODA Latency
services.description: Average latency to Iran /24 blocks

services.name: IODA Packet Loss
services.description: Packet loss rate to Iran /24 blocks

services.name: Web Censorship
services.description: OONI web connectivity anomaly rate ‚Äî percentage of tested websites showing censorship
